extracted_text: R B K AKESH Bengaluru,Karnataka +91-8217067493 rraki8657@gmail.com Rakesh B K RAKESHBK08 EDUCATION JSS Academy of Technical Education, Bengaluru 12 2023 – Present B.E. in Information Science and Engineering - CGPA – 8.1 Bengaluru , India S J (Govt)Polytechnic,K.R Circle 12 2020 – 07 2023 Diploma in Mechatronics - CGPA - 7.8 , IndiaBengaluru , India B G S Public School Gauribidanur, India NCERT State Board – Percentage: 89.89% 2010 – 2020 Technical Skills • Languages: Java, Python (Basics), C, JavaScript • Web Development: HTML, CSS, React.js, Node.js, Express.js. • Databases: MySQL, MongoDB • Tools/Platforms: Git, GitHub, VS Code, IntelliJ IDEA, Power BI, Tableau, LateX, Arduino • Concepts: Data Structures and Algorithms, OOPs, CN, OS ,Artificial intelligence, Machine Learning, IoT PROJECTS AI-Based Sign Language Detection System April 2024 – June 2024 • A machine learning-powered application that interprets sign language gestures to bridge communication gaps. • Developed a sign language recognition system using Python, OpenCV, and TensorFlow for real-time gesture detection and classification via webcam. • Trained a CNN model on datasets like ASL Alphabet and Sign Language MNIST to achieve high classification accuracy. AUTOMATED ANDROID MALWARE DETECTION Feb 2025 - present • About project Analyze APK files using static features (like permissions, intents, activities, and API calls). • Evaluate and compare the performance of multiple algorithms: Random Forest (RF), Extra Trees (ET), Artificial Neural Networks (ANN), and Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN). • Combine these models using ensemble learning techniques to create a robust hybrid system that benefits from the strengths of individual classifiers..
